text: The Poor Little Rich Girl (or Poor Little Rich Girl) is a 1936 musical movie. Shirley Temple plays Barbara Barry, Gloria Stuart plays Margaret Allen and Alice Faye plays Jerry Dolan. The subject is a girl who is neglected by her rich and busy father. The movie got poor reviews from critics. Category:1936 drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Cummings
title: Poor Little Rich Girl
